reviewText: First, the quality is pretty bad and blurred. The strong military-style female voice is "guiding" each movement. The actors pause and wait for some invisible signal to do each part of each exercise! Second, DVDs inside my package were numbered 1, 2, and 6! All 3 DVD front covers show female performers, yet one (DVD #2) was mismatched with male performer DVD. Third, The menu gives choice of lesson 1 and 2 per each DVD but it plays just one long segment, so Lesson 2 would be a continuous second half of the same segment (without any announcement). You get the picture...
